# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate that receives the response of the app’s products request.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any SKProductsRequestDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Setting the Delegate

- **SKProductsRequestDelegate**: A set of methods the delegate implements so it receives the product information your app requests.
